introduction: SYNOPSISAfter witnessing her mother's infidelity, Su-mi's psychological scar creates abnormal sexual tendencies. When she meets the hoodlum Ma Do-yub, Su-mi transforms herself into a sexy woman but runs away from the rough Do-yub. Afterwards, Su-mi marries the potter, Se-hyung. But Su-mi is unsatisfied with Se-hyung's abstinence so she lives a double life by wandering the streets at night. Ultimately, Su-mi falls into depression and ends up in a mental institution. She confesses everything to her husband and tries to regain her happy life. At this time, Do-yub reappears and torments Su-mi. She returns to her hometown. Se-hyung protects Su-mi even when Do-yub demands to hand her over. But Se-hyung gets in a car accident and ends up in the hospital. Su-mi goes to him and asks for his forgiveness.故事在本能听证目睹母亲寿美jinige的事情后只改变，以满足热的女孩欺负图村段苛刻不能逃避镇地图段。于是苏米结婚陶工sehyeong了双重的生命在街上游荡，晚上感到不满丈夫的节制。苏米最终通过看抑郁症丈夫精神病院承认自己的状态重获幸福的生活。然后地图段显示goerophija苏米她下山了家。Sehyeong也被要求放弃自己的地图段萨·萨是在车祸住进了医院的倡导者的恐吓和希望参观曹秀原谅他。
